Title: The Great Destroyer
Writer: Ray McKinnon (created by), Scott Teems (teleplay), Ray McKinnon (teleplay), Scott Teems (story), Chad Feehan (executive story editor), Coleman Herbert (executive story editor), Scott Teems (story)
Actors: Aden Young, Abigail Spencer, J. Smith-Cameron, Adelaide Clemens
Plot: Daniel reluctantly asks for help. Janet sees the error of her ways. Jon Stern reveals some startling news, triggering a heated family debate. Jared turns to Ted, Jr. and Tawney for comfort. CJ Pickens offers some unsettling information.
